attributes.action: Enforce tattooists who do a poor job recreating what asked for pay for removal.
attributes.background: There are plenty of tattooists who do a very poor job recreating what was asked for, with this being permanent and removal being so expensive. Make tattooists who do a poor job (via discretion of a judge) pay for the removal and/or cover up of the poorly done job.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law to require tattooists to pay for removal, in cases where the tattoo is found to be of poor quality.
